alley.name: Damp Alleyway
alley.description: A dark, narrow space between two towering mega-structures. Rain drizzles down, mixing with the neon glow from above.

street.name: Main Street
street.description: The street is filled with people in trench coats and cybernetic enhancements. Hover-cars zip by overhead.

penthouse.name: High-Rise Penthouse
penthouse.description: The luxurious top floor of the Arasaka tower. The view of the city is breathtaking.

inventory.name: broken_pipe
inventory.description: A rusty piece of metal, heavy enough to be a weapon.

history_window.result:
You move north to the Main Street.

The street is filled with people in trench coats and cybernetic enhancements. Hover-cars zip by overhead.

[EVENT]: A cyber-rat with glowing red eyes lunges at you from a trash can!

Main Street
The street is filled with people in trench coats and cybernetic enhancements. Hover-cars zip by overhead.

Exits: south, up

You move south to the Damp Alleyway.

A dark, narrow space between two towering mega-structures. Rain drizzles down, mixing with the neon glow from above.
You cannot go up from here.

Damp Alleyway
A dark, narrow space between two towering mega-structures. Rain drizzles down, mixing with the neon glow from above.

You see: broken_pipe
Exits: north

You take the broken_pipe.

[EVENT]: As you lift the pipe, you notice a discarded credit-chip underneath.

You move north to the Main Street.

The street is filled with people in trench coats and cybernetic enhancements. Hover-cars zip by overhead.

[EVENT]: A cyber-rat with glowing red eyes lunges at you from a trash can!

Main Street
The street is filled with people in trench coats and cybernetic enhancements. Hover-cars zip by overhead.

Exits: south, up

You move up to the High-Rise Penthouse.

The luxurious top floor of the Arasaka tower. The view of the city is breathtaking.
